Issue.summary: Fabric CA integration with first-network document
Issue.description: I am looking for adding new peers to existing examples like fabcar and first-network via fabric-ca. Is there a step by step document which can help me adding new peers and orgs. also, if i have to connect to two different machines/nodes where all i have make changes. It would be nice if there is document for the same.
